sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这部影片获得了很多奖。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè bù yǐngpiān huòdé le hěn duō jiǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce film a remporté beaucoup de prix.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This film has won many awards.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chángchéng měitiān yǒu hěn duō yóukè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La Grande Muraille a beaucoup de touristes chaque jour.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The Great Wall has many tourists every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 西北地区天气比较干燥。
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le climat du nord-ouest est assez sec.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The weather in the northwest is relatively dry.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La nuit est très calme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's very quiet at night.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā míngtiān jiù kěyǐ chūyuàn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il pourra sortir de l'hôpital demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He can be discharged from the hospital tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dìtiě zhàn zài qiánmiàn bù yuǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La station de métro n'est pas loin devant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The subway station is not far ahead.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个公司的名称是什么？
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège gōngsī de míngchēng shì shénme?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quel est le nom de cette entreprise ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What is the name of this company?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiàwǔ yǒu yī chǎng zúqiú bǐsài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a un match de football cet après-midi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is a football match this afternoon.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'apprends l'anglais.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I am learning English.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le temps devient de plus en plus froid.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The weather is getting colder and colder.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tant qu'on fait des efforts, on peut y arriver.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: As long as you work hard, you can do it.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est correct de faire ainsi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's right to do it this way.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Bon voyage !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Have a safe trip!

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime jouer au tennis.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to play tennis.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle aime les vêtements blancs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She likes white clothes.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèxiē qián gòu mǎi yī běn shū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet argent suffit pour acheter un livre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This money is enough to buy a book.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Venez ici, s'il vous plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please come over here.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā dāying bāng wǒ zuò zhè jiàn shì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a promis de m'aider à faire cela.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He promised to help me do this.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants jouent sur la pelouse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The children are playing on the grass.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī míng Zhōngguó liúxuéshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle est une étudiante internationale de Chine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is a Chinese international student.
